texts.description: The file defines localized string for MAM ticketing functions.

text.value: [IT]An error occurred while logging the user in. This may be due to incorrect credentials or an invalid ticket.
[IT]Unable to log in because the account is pending.
[IT]Unable to log in because the account is inactive.
[IT]An error occurred while creating necessary objects.
[IT]Unable to log in because it is disallowed by the account's state.
[IT]Attempt to create the COM secure store failed.
[IT]Gateway.xml is not valid XML or does not exist.
[IT]Unable to find a localized site for the specified provider ID.
